name: Rock Band 4
summary: Rock Band 4 is an upcoming music video game in development by Harmonix. Rock Band 4 will allow players to simulate the playing of licensed music across many different decades and genres using instrument controllers that mimic playing lead and bass guitar, drums, and vocals. As the fourth main installment in the Rock Band franchise, it will be released for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on October 6, 2015. Mad Catz, who is also developing new instrument controllers for the game, will market and distribute the title worldwide.
